• Ernest Ojeh

  • Writing
  • Contact

I design and develop solutions
that solve users' problems.

I'm a User Interface and User Experience designer based in Amsterdam. I work at Booking.com crafting better experiences for users.
I previously worked at Konga.com and Andela.


PROJECTS
  • KongaPay

    An online payments system that makes paying and getting paid simpler.

  • NewThird

    Website design for a digital design agency.

  • Staash

    An app for saving products you like for later.

  • Nigeria Telecoms Icons

    Free SVG Icons of telecoms operators in Nigeria

  • Appscreens

    A site that curates a collection of startup demo videos and screencasts.

  • Trello Full Image

    A chrome extension that make the Trello "view image" modal larger.

SPEAKING
  • Usable UX Meetup — November 2016

    I gave a talk on the process of building payment solutions for Nigeria. #

  • KongaPay Developer Conference - July 2016

    My team organized a conference for developers using our platform. I gave a talk on the process of building the KongaPay product, and how to use the web payment interface and SDKs. #

  • UX Lagos Meetup — March 2016

    I was part of a panel that gave a talk on the state of design in Nigeria, user experience, design process, problem-solving and introduction for new designers. #
